These are all names of drugs that are used to treat various medical conditions, but they are not diseases themselves. Therefore, the table above contains the correct information, with each drug name listed as a separate entity in the "Disease" column.

The only disease mentioned in the paragraph is FPDc (fetal pulse duration corrected). The other entities mentioned, Amiodarone, Paroxetine, Terfenadine, and Citalopram, are names of drugs that may be used to treat various medical conditions, but they are not diseases themselves.
